name: DekorSkills
0:
”Alexa, launch Dekor”
”Alexa, tell Dekor to turn on the hall light”
”Alexa, tell Dekor to turn the garden on for 4 hours”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dekor
Developer Terms of Use
des: The DEKOR EZ WiFi dimmer has a new friend – Amazon’s Alexa! Turn your DEKOR lights on or off, control brightnesses, and set up schedules with your voice using the DEKOR skill.
